text:
January 29, 1965
Mrs* Marion Corwell
Associate Director
School Relations
Dearborn Public Schools
4824 Lois
Dearborn, Michigan 48126
Dear Marion:
We have not really abandoned all thought of a speakers guide «—
we merely wanted to report to you and Lee some of our thoughts.
Lee and 1 have already set up an appointment for Feburary 9 when
he will be in Washington. At that time, Lee and 1 and Jim Fellows
will discuss this whole matter in greater detail.
We still feel there is a great need for such a guide but want
to be sure we can overcome the problems 1 pointed out in my letter
of January 22. Lee and 1, or both of us, will advise you of our
discussion.
Cordially,
Harold £. Hill
HEH/mlm
c<~\ Le*c C#^
